comments.body: What is the goal of showing the result of inlining in the decompiler? Helping to debug expansions? If there are no other reasons, I think that this should be done only when given a special flag.
I also think that. But for this PR I avoided changing functionality. I will do it after #5241 is merged.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@
  override protected def picklerPhases: List[List[Phase]] =
    List(new InlineCalls) :: // TODO should we really inline for the decompiler?
    Nil
